message: I propose dividing the $100 in a 75-25 split. This takes into account the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly better deal. This 60-40 split is a fair starting point for me.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a 50-50 split. This ensures fairness given the inflationary pressures we're facing.
